law.history: Repealed 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 324, sec. 30, effective July 1, 1992. -- Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 88, secs. 92 and 93. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1636.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Copies of records of other states and United States -- Evidence when.
metadata.note: Repeal of this section became effective July 1, 1992, in compliance with 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 324, secs. 30 and 33.
